level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue all rules necessary to carry out the purposes of § 7-1531.24 and § 7- 1531.26. These rules shall include, at a minimum:
Standards for the training and qualification of those hospital and hospice representatives who have been designated to make consent requests pursuant to § 7-1531.24;
Procedures to be used when making consent requests under § 7-1531.24; and
Procedures to facilitate effective coordination among hospitals, hospices, other health-care facilities and agencies, organ and tissue banks, and procurement organizations.
